summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx detailing shipping charges incurred by Jeffrey E. Epstein for various packages sent between January 9 and January 18, 2002. The invoice includes transportation charges, discounts, and details of the shipments, including recipients and delivery dates.

keyFacts: The invoice details shipping charges totaling $379.76 for various packages sent by Jeffrey E. Epstein.
The invoice includes multiple recipients, indicating a wide network of correspondence.
Packages were sent and delivered between January 9 and January 18, 2002.
Discounts totaling $44.43 were applied to the shipping charges.
The document contains multiple references to recipients, including Lauren Kwitner, Mark Landon, and Ghislaine Maxwell.
